summary: The Art of Magicka - CBBE - UNP by Zonzai and Kalell adapted to ADEC body mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod ever for any game. So C&C are welcome. :)
The Art of Magicka - CBBE - UNP by Zonzai and Kalell adapted to ADEC body mod robes only and no transparent robes yet..

This file contains only meshes, so original mod is required to be installed first, and then this mod.

Original mod links
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1040

I do not claim any thing of this mod all credit goes to Zonzai and Kalell for creating this awesome mod. 

No known bugs, i\'ve tested this mod myself.

Do post if you find any.
author: gameLvr85
